website_summaries.verdict: The Puma Fenty Suede Cleated Creeper is part of Rihanna's latest Fenty Puma Collection. It has a similar upper to the best-seller Puma Fenty Creeper, but with a distinguishable elevated cleated rubber platform sole.It ticks off the boxes in terms of comfort, style, and perfect fit, as attested by most purchasers. It is, however, a bit pricey than the usual fashion sneakers and also bulky and heavy for some purchasers.
pros: The Puma Fenty Suede Cleated Creeper is available in several colorways for both men and women
This shoe fits perfectly and true to size, according to several purchasers
Many reviewers considered this shoe as an amazing purchase because it is stylish and comfortable at the same time
Most purchasers were so pleased with the exceptional quality of this shoe and described it as "beautiful
A few buyers were delighted that this shoe is easy to walk in despite its elevated platform
One reviewer commented that the padded collar and tongue updated the feel and wear of this shoe
Some purchasers took note and liked the cleated rubber sole of this shoe as the elevated platform makes them look taller than usual
cons: The Puma Fenty Suede Cleated Creeper is an expensive sneaker
The majority of the reviewers claimed that this shoe is bulky and a bit heavy, but surprisingly not too heavy as they expected it to be
Some reviewers had difficulties wearing this shoe as it somehow weighs down the foot

customer_reviews.title: They are legit!
customer_reviews.text: They are legit! Comes in the original box and everything! I got mine in my regular size and they fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Richard White

customer_reviews.title: The most uncomfortable shoes I have ever worn.
customer_reviews.text: I walked 3min to the subway and my feet were killing me. There is no arch...they are flat and give zero support. They look great...not worth the pain.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Buchanan

customer_reviews.title: Worth the wait
customer_reviews.text: I've wanted these for years as creepers and pumas are my two favorite shoes and this combined the two. I would up buying a pair for me and a pair for my teenage son. We both love them. The size is perfect and they are so comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Total Legit!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome shoes, comfy, elevated and stylish. I gave it four stars because they are somewhat heavy and lacking in flexibility. Nonetheless, these Puma rocks!
customer_reviews.author: Sammie

customer_reviews.title: Super hot 🔥🔥
customer_reviews.text: Great shoes ,a little narrow in the toe area and no arch support . But great price for some hot shoes and came with a Puma/ Fenty dust bag
customer_reviews.author: p.wogg

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: I’m stand at 6’3, size 12 men’s shoes (wide feet). I wasn’t sure about these when I initially bought them. Let me just say, I am SO happy that I did! Because these are everything!! They fit perfectly. There isn’t a ton of wiggle room or arch support If someone was flat footed, but over all definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Bernadette fong

customer_reviews.title: FENTY feet
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love my shoes! Not very comfortable for long uses. However, all the compliments make up for it. I’d definitely purchase in different color.
customer_reviews.author: edgar jimenez

customer_reviews.title: Super cool!
customer_reviews.text: Super cool product and amazing packaging. Love everything about this product!
customer_reviews.author: Christian Pimentel

customer_reviews.title: But these shoes
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are perfect just like the perfect. I’m honestly in love with them, definitely worth the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Henry

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: They came in quickly, they were heavier than expected but that’s not the shows fault. Platform is like 1 1/2- 2 2 1/2 inches
customer_reviews.author: Nick Carter

customer_reviews.title: There really flate footed shoes, so your going to ware them certain places make sure you purchase some extra arch support.
customer_reviews.text: Like the style and the extra height while wearing the shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Montezell

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!!! cuz its so lit
customer_reviews.text: This is so lit must buy and it came so fast worth it guyssss
customer_reviews.author: Jonnell

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: I love the quality of thr shoe and the facr that its not as heavy as i expected.... its my new favorite shoe just ordered every color in my size
customer_reviews.author: Marcus Deron Jeffery

customer_reviews.title: I need them in every color!!!
customer_reviews.text: Only tried the shoe on so far but I’m in love lol. I wear a 12/13 in women’s and ordered the men’s 11 because of another reviewers suggestion. So glad I listened because they fit perfectly. Im a big girl but don’t need wide shoe unless it’s cut super narrow. For example torrid shoes are too wide. I ordered on 5/18 and they got here 5/23. S/o to my homegirl for letting me know what’s up lol she has the yellow ones.
customer_reviews.author: Big Baby

customer_reviews.title: better than expected
customer_reviews.text: came with a nice bag to place them in. Picture doesn't give these shoes their just do. And a great price. A must buy!
customer_reviews.author: Donica Y.

product_meta.title: PUMA mens Cleated Creeper Suede Cleated Creeper
product_meta.description: Suede PUMA Select x FENTY by Rihanna sneakers with a contrast stripe and platform rubber soles. Laces over the branded tongue. Full leather sock liner.
